评论详情: I liked how this over all looked. It was not too heavy. It was not too tight nor made me sweat. The chains did not tangle. I hung up this to store. Definitely a great piece for anyone looking to add silver tone to an outfit without having to deal with normal jewelry.

This waist chain is a striking addition to any edgy wardrobe. The layered design combines both black leather and silver chains, creating a bold and eye-catching look. The belt is adjustable, ensuring a comfortable fit, and the sturdy materials feel durable while maintaining a stylish edge. It adds the perfect touch of punk and gothic flair to outfits, whether for casual wear or a night out. Overall, this body jewelry piece delivers both style and versatility, making it a great accessory for anyone looking to enhance their alternative fashion.

评论概述: Love the design but I just wish that it went all the way around instead of just halfway
评论详情: Cool chain belt but the chains are only on half of it. So if you're wearing it with the chains to the front the back has no chains which kind of bothers me. It would look a lot better if the change simply went all the way around the length of the belt. But it's cheap and affordable and it does look cool.
This belt really takes outfits to the next level! It was pretty cheap but it's sturdy and fits nicely.
Really easy to put on by yourself, adjustable and it catches your eye even in the most basic outfits

A nice waist chain belt that works as an ideal accessory to outfits. The chains feel pretty heavy weight but not really noticeable when it's on. Definitely a keeper to have in my wardrobe and will probably wear at events and parties.
The metal chains are really nice, though it really works better if the chains are placed on the backside. It really makes the decorations pop.
This fits a very wide range of sizes! I'm sitting around 32" for my waist, and there are still plenty of notches left. Good price on sale. Looks great and the links feel strong.

评论概述: Edgy, cheap but decent for price
评论详情: I recently bought this chain belt, and my step daughter absolutely loves it. It’s quite long on my teenager, but I think it would fit an adult perfectly. We just modified it for her. The adjustable length is a great feature, making it easy to find the right fit for most.  While the chain does look a bit cheap, she don’t mind since it's mainly for the aesthetic. It adds a stylish touch to outfits without breaking the bank. The design is exactly what you're looking for if you want edgy.  This belt is perfect for an edgy style and really completes any outfit. Whether paired with jeans, a dress, or even shorts, it adds that extra flair. Overall, I’m really happy with what I ordered!

Gonna mention this every time I see a product like this, but this is not leather. Leather is Hide, it can be made sturdy and solid. Vinyl is Plastic, and is often messy and prone to delaminating.  This one seems to work just fine for what it is, entirely just the aesthetic side of things, but yeah, that bit annoyed me a touch.

评论概述: Looks good and worth the price
评论详情: Not too expensive for a decorative chain belt. Nice and adjustable, and the chains feel weighty without being cheap or overly heavy on the body.

I got caught on 3 different things and I’m honestly so freaking surprised I haven’t snapped anything yet and that speaks volume in terms of quality. Don’t get me wrong this will definitely break if you snag it on something and pull hard but don’t do that and you’ll be fine lol.  Before I get into it I wanna start by saying I am considered plus size but I’m more of an “acceptable” plus size unfortunately I did have to add this because if you have more stomach sadly this will not fit you.  If you’re in a smaller frame you will need to add more holes to be able to use it the way it comes it may not be enough to get to stay on you the way you may want it too.  I’ve only worn this once so far and it’s extremely comfortable. I got a lot of compliments and it goes with just about anything. I paired it with the “Forbidden pants”, plain black shirt and ankle high platform boots.  PS: (your body is beautiful big or small don’t let nobody tell you different. You are that girl and will forever be)
This fits well and looks great on!

评论概述: Wish it came in a smaller size
评论详情: This is really cute, I got it for a music festival before realizing that I would probably get turned away because of the chains. The belt is kind of scratchy if you wear it against your skin. I really like the style, I only wish it came in different sizes. It's very adjustable but still significantly too big for me, even at the tightest hole. I'd have to make my own hole to make it fit but then it wouldn't look as good as the picture because the chains wouldn't lay properly. My waist size is 27 inches.

The chains on this belt make a swishy sound when they swing against each other. It sounds a little cheap - in the fact that you can tell it's not heavy chain. But a heavier chain may not have been very comfortable. Either way, there are a lot of holes and it looks nice. I plan to wear it against some future outfit that looks too stark and black. This will be a nice addition.

Fun belt to dress up a ton of outfits. The chains are decorative without having too much weight. The only downside is the buckle in the back. It can be uncomfortable if you are sitting, as the buckle is on your spine instead of below your belly button like with a normal belt.

Ordered the Ulekuke Punk Gothic Leather Waist Chain Belt and it arrived in good order. It is a basic no-frills construction, and the leather belt can accommodate a wide range of waist sizes. That said, I will have to cut it short by several inches as it is too long and there is no attractive way to wear it "as is". Otherwise, the chains fall nicely at the hip, and it makes a nice addition for costume or themed wear.

This is sized for medium to large waists; it hung really low at my hips on my slender body (womens 2 or 4). I didn't like how the excess slack of the belt created a tail behind me. So I cut the excess of the belt and punched a new hole to make it as tight as I could. Unfortunately, I was unable to make it any shorter than I did and it is still a little too big, but will suffice. It's a really cute piece and helps accessorize a plain skirt or dress.

Super cute! Belt is super long with lots of slots for sizing options Decent as far as quality, but definitely not real leather, more like nice quality vinyl over some decent thicker fabric If you're gentle with your goth attire, this should last a while! Decent for the price Not heavy or over cumbersome
Cute and stylish for my daughter's Gothic outfits.
Nice looking belt with average quality leather. The chains are decently heavy and nice quality

This is a great chain belt for accenting your wardrobe.  It has enough notches to be plus size friendly (I'm usually a size 18/20 in pants and this has some room still for a bit larger builds).  It's faux leather and the chains don't tangle easily which I'm thankful for.  Doesn't seem like it will snag or break easily!

评论概述: Super comfortable and made very well!
评论详情: I will say this is a lot bigger than I expected it to be so for me it hangs alot lower than I thought it would, But it still looks really good. I was even super surprised to realize it was even comfortable wearing when I sat down. I barely remembered it was on me most of the day. It is a great addition to alot of outfits and looks super cool and adds an added touch to your wardrobe! Love this piece alot
The chains are some kind of light metal material so they're not heavy but they have that satisfying clinking noise. It's super sexy too and works well with any goth outfit. I love it.

This is so cute! Well made, the belt is a bit on the cheap side. But not so much that I am worried about it breaking or anything. Really nice that it has A LOT of holes in it, so this will fit just about anyone! It is shown being use on the front and that is super cute, but I would that I like it on one hip even better. Really adds that bling I was looking for. Can't wait to wear it out!

评论概述: Tough Time Believing This Is Leather
评论详情: The belt has the "look" and "feel" of what seems to be leather, but on closer inspection there are no imperfections at all. Leather, as a natural product, usually has some discernible qualities as "not perfect." But leather is rugged and long lasting. This belt doesn't seem to be that. The design is really nice though. The metal is decent quality and so is the build. A nice novelty item for fun and play.
